generated_body: In this article, the user can expect an exploration of the incident involving Mason Rudolph, who was struck in the head by his own helmet during a game. The discussion may focus on the implications of this incident for Rudolph's performance and the overall narrative surrounding player safety in sports. Additionally, the piece is likely to analyze public and media reactions, considering whether Rudolph is receiving adequate scrutiny for the situation. The article could provide insights into how similar incidents are handled in the league, shedding light on accountability in professional football.
